settings.title: Julia H.R
settings.copy: I bought these sunglasses for a guy I’ve been hooking up with for a few months because he mentioned he needed some and these were the exact style he was looking for. I figured at $16, it would be a nice gesture and I would be regarded as the angel that found him the perfect sunnies. I am blown away by the quality for the price. They look like designer sunglasses. They are sturdy and flattering. I have worn them almost every day since. I will be shopping at WearMe Pro again soon. And I will not be purchasing sunglasses for anyone but myself ever again.

Thank you! ~ Carlos

settings.section_1_copy:
WearMe Pro started with one big goal - to provide reasonably priced eyewear that is on-trend! We believe that investing in over-priced branding and logos, is simply not worth it. We rather you save that extra money and invest it into experiences. When buying our sunglasses, you will not be paying for unnecessary mark ups. We truly rejoice when our customers love their new eyewear and we know we didn’t overcharge them for it!

Another important aspect of WearMe Pro is to give back. In 2020 WearMe Pro has partnered with Arizona Humane Society, a non-profit animal welfare and protection agency. For every order placed on our website, we will donate one can of cat/dog food to a dog or cat in need!
settings.section_2_copy: All our eyewear is precisely inspected before we package them for you. We put our heart and soul into ensuring you’re 100% satisfied with your product. Unlike other brands, we started as a family owned company and our customers are the reason we thrive. We enjoy connecting with you on the daily basis! Need help picking a style? Need special shipping arrangements? We are always here for you:
settings.section_2_post_email_copy: We promise, you will NEVER get an automated reply from us!

settings.title: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
settings.answer: We ship all our orders every morning Monday - Friday via USPS or FedEx Express. We offer $2.99 US shipping via USPS (4-6 business days) and $6.99 2-Day Shipping via Fedex Express. Fedex Express arrival time will depend on your location and can take from 2-4 business days. You can learn more about shipping options here. Please note that due to COVID-19, we have seen some delays in delivery.

settings.title: How often do you update your catalogue?
settings.answer: On average we restock and add new styles every 2–3 months.

settings.title: Can I cancel or update my order?
settings.answer: Usually, our orders are processed very quickly, we have a system set up to send all orders through to our fulfillment center right when the order is placed. Unfortunately, this often means we are unable to make changes to your order but we can always try! Please reach out to service@wearmepro.com about any address changes or cancellations. However, please note that once the order is processed by our fulfillment center, we cannot make any changes.

settings.title: I forgot to add the coupon code while checking out? Can you add it?
settings.answer: Oh no! We are so sorry to hear that! Unfortunately, once the order is processed we cannot add the coupon code to the order.

settings.title: What do I do if my package is marked as delivered but I cannot locate it?
settings.answer: Please allow 48 hours for your package to arrive. If package still does not show up, please call the shipping provider. They often hold the package for pick up.  If you still cannot locate the package - please email: service@wearmepro.com.

settings.title: When do you ship your orders?
settings.answer: We ship our orders Monday - Friday! If you place an order over the weekend, it will not ship until Monday morning.

settings.title: I made a mistake in my address! Help!
settings.answer: Please email us at service@wearmepro.com with the correct address as soon as possible. If we can, we will update the address. Unfortunately, sometimes we cannot make the change in time and we cannot be held accountable for reshipping the item to a new address.

settings.title: How can I track my order?
settings.answer:
1. If you have a WearMe Pro account - you can log in to check the status of your package.

2. If you do not have a WearMe Pro account, once your order is shipped, you will receive an email with your tracking number. You can then track the package right to your door!

settings.title: How do I return my order?
settings.answer:
You can return your order within 14 days for the cost of $5.00 (domestic only). Return shipping is FREE when the store credit option is chosen. When choosing store credit - you have 30 days to return your order. You can start your return here.

We also accept international returns, however the customer is responsible for shipping the item on their own and a return label will not be provided.

settings.title: I sent in my return, when will I get the refund?
settings.answer: Please note, it can take up to 14 days for us to receive your package and process a return. Once in our facility, we try to get to all returns within 48 hours. We will refund you to your original payment method, please be aware that payments can take up to 3 business days to process depending on your bank or payment provider.

settings.title: I received a damaged product, how do I get a replacement?
settings.answer: Please contact us at service@wearmepro.com and we will help resolve this issue promptly.

settings.title: I received a free pair because I spent over $80, do I have to return it?
settings.answer: If you received a free promotional pair, you must return it, if the total of your order is below $80 after the return.

settings.title: Do your sunglasses have UV protection?
settings.answer: Of course, all our sunglasses offer 100% UVB + UVA protection.

settings.title: How do I find sunglasses for someone with a bigger head?
settings.answer: All our sunglasses have size charts. Please use the frame width measurement to ensure the sunglasses will be comfortable. You can also learn how to use our size chart here.

settings.title: What are polarized sunglasses?
settings.answer:
Polarized lenses reduce glare from bright sun and flat surfaces, offering a clearer image and reducing eye fatigue over long periods outside. This can be great at the beach or when driving. The lens is coated in a special filter that blocks intense reflected light.

Polarized lenses are not the same thing as UV lenses, which protect your eyes from sun damage.

You can shop all of our polarized styles here.

settings.title: How do I clean my sunglasses?
settings.answer:
1. Rinse glasses under lukewarm water
2. Add a tiny drop of soap to lens and gently swirl around on lens with your fingers
3. Rinse again
4. Dry gently with a microfiber cloth

settings.title: How do I know if the sunglasses are the right size?
settings.answer: We recommend using our size chart which is located on the product page. If you have a pair of sunglasses/glasses that fit you well and are comfortable, try finding a new frame with the same or similar measurements. You can also learn more about finding the right pair of sunglasses here.

settings.title: What are blue light glasses?
settings.answer: Blue light glasses are clear lens glasses that offer protection from blue light that is emitted from our electronic devices. If you spend a lot of time on your phone or you work in front of the computer - they may help your eyes feel less tired! You can learn more about WearMe Pro blue light glasses - here.

settings.title: What emits blue light?
settings.answer:
• Many indoor lightbulbs
• Computer monitor screens
• Flat screen LED televisions
• Smart phone screens
• Tablet screens

settings.title: Why wear blue light glasses?
settings.answer:
Excessive exposure to blue light can send mixed signals to your built-in body clock, telling your brain it’s daytime even in the late PM hours. For many, the result is insomnia, difficulty staying asleep, irregular sleep patterns, tense dream states, and/or chronic exhaustion.

Wearing blue light glasses can help decrease your exposure to the blue light emitted from screens.

settings.title: Can I use a contact lens prescription for ordering glasses?
settings.answer: Prescriptions for contact lenses cannot be used for glasses. A contact lens prescription can only be used to purchase contact lenses.

settings.title: How do I measure my PD (Pupillary Distance)?
settings.answer:
PD, or pupillary distance, refers to the distance in millimeters between the center of one pupil to the center of the other. Having a correct PD on your glasses prescription ensures that you are looking through the ideal spot in your lenses. If this number was not provided on your prescription by your eye care professional, you can measure it yourself in 3 easy steps:

1. Look in the mirror and line up a ruler horizontally between your eyes.

2. Make sure the ruler is lined exactly underneath the middle of the left pupil.

3. Measure the exact distance between your left pupil and your right pupil in millimeters.

4. Repeat steps 1 - 3 a couple times for accuracy and use the average for your final measurement.

settings.title: Can I send my prescription by fax or email?
settings.answer: We cannot accept prescriptions by fax or email. To ensure accuracy we ask that you enter your prescription manually or upload your RX file from your optometrist (recommended) with our easy online ordering system.

settings.title: What is the warranty for WMP prescription lenses?
settings.answer: WMP prescription lenses come with a one (1) year warranty. If there’s a manufacturing defect in our products or their workmanship, we’ll make it right and cover shipping costs while we’re at it. The warranty does not cover scratches, breaks or other damage and/or return requests caused by accidents, negligence, or improper care.

settings.title: What is the return policy for prescription lenses?
settings.answer: All prescription purchases can be returned within 14 days to receive a full refund. Click here to start a refund.

settings.title: Do the lenses come with UV protection?
settings.answer: Yes! All of our prescription lenses come with Full UV protection.

settings.title: Do the lenses have blue light protection?
settings.answer: Yes, we do offer prescription lenses with blue light protection! Please note that lenses do not automatically come with blue light protection so make sure to select the blue light lens option during the ordering process.

settings.title: Can I use my health insurance to cover the expense?
settings.answer: Currently, we do not work directly with insurance providers. However, we recommend contacting your insurance provider to see if you have out-of-network benefits. You may have the option to submit a detailed receipt of purchase to your insurance company for reimbursement.

settings.title: How long is the shipping for RX?
settings.answer:
United States: 7-12 business days

International: 12-14 business days

settings.title: What if I entered the wrong prescription?
settings.answer: Please get in touch with us as soon as possible at 1 (480) 687 4907 or email us at SERVICE@WEARMEPRO.COM.

settings.title: Do you offer sunglasses with prescription lenses?
settings.answer: At this time we do not offer sunglasses with prescription lenses. However, if this is something you’d like to see from us, please let us know! We’d love to hear your comments and feedback at service@wearmepro.com.

settings.box_text: At WMP we believe that quality eyewear shouldn’t be exclusive to designer labels. That’s why we’re committed to creating fashionable, affordable glasses that are accessible to everyone. Every product we offer — yesterday, today, and tomorrow — is (W)orn and (M)ade with (P)urpose.
settings.col_text_right: Whether your vibe is sporty chic, classic cool, retro glam, or somewhere in between, we’re advocates for rocking what makes you feel your best. That’s why we are dedicated to designing frames with your style in mind. Because the best thing you can wear is confidence.
settings.col_text_left: Overpaying for a logo? We’re not about that. As a small, independent, family-owned business, we’re able to offer finely crafted, on-trend eyewear without the luxury brand price tag. Don’t take it from us though, we’ll let our 7k+ five-star ratings do the talking.
settings.purpose_text: We’re obsessively passionate about two things; providing you with the best specs AND saving pets! As proud supporters of the Arizona Humane Society, a portion of every eyewear purchase goes to animals in need. To date, we’ve been able to donate more than 100k cans of food and truckloads of other much needed supplies. So thank you for helping us make a pawsitive impact!
settings.founders_title: GET TO KNOW OUR FOUNDERS, DAVID & ULA
settings.founders_text:
Cześć! That means “hello” in Polish, David & Ula’s native language. That’s the only greeting David knew when he immigrated to the United States at 16 years old. Fast forward to 2011, David - now 21, fluent in English, and married to Ula - launches WMP Eyewear out of a small Chicago apartment with roughly 100 sunglasses and a dream to disrupt the eyewear industry.
In 2017 David & Ula left Windy City for the Valley of the Sun (aka Phoenix, Arizona) where the company quickly expanded. By 2019 WMP was named the #9 Fastest Growing Arizona Company by Inc. 5000 with a 6,500 square foot warehouse to show for it.
When not designing fresh frames, the duo enjoys adventuring with their one-year-old daughter, Noa, and French Bulldog, Ivy.

settings.years_text: WMP Eyewear is born in a small Illinois apartment.
David spends months in Asia searching high & low for a manufacturer that shares WMP’s core values.
WMP moves from the Windy City to sunny Tempe, Arizona and the team starts to grow.﻿
With products now found in more that 1500 retail stores nationwide, WMP’s reach expands beyond e-commerce.﻿
Inc. 5000 releases its esteemed annual Fastest Growing Companies list with WMP ranking #377.﻿
In an effort to give back, WMP launches an ongoing partnership with Arizona Humane Society, donating a portion of every purchase to animals in need.﻿
WMP continues to evolve, welcoming a crew of eyewear-loving team members!﻿

settings.text_id: Ten million tons of plastic are dumped in our oceans annually, equal to more than a garbage truckload every minute. In fact, by 2050 there will be more plastic in the oceans than fish. Instead of allowing these bottles to aimlessly pollute oceans worldwide we’re taking a step towards change and giving them a purpose. We’ve always offered high-quality, fashion-forward glasses at a great price. Now, we present an eyewear collection crafted with intent. We’re proud to release a line of eco-friendly, ethically sourced eyewear made from recycled materials that doesn’t sacrifice style or quality.

settings.title: Plastic Bottles
settings.desc:
Discarded plastic bottles are removed
from the world’s oceans.

settings.title: Shredded Plastic
settings.desc:
That rescued plastic is shipped to a location
to be cleaned and shredded.

settings.title: Pellets
settings.desc:
The shredded plastic is melted down
and reformed into pellets.

settings.title: Sunglasses
settings.desc:
The finished product is your new, quality-crafted
recycled shades.

While a portion of every WMP purchase will still go back to pets in need at our hometown Humane Society, a percentage of proceeds from the Eco Collection will be donated to The Sea Turtle Conservancy.

settings.heading: New: Vince
settings.content: What happens when you take an iconic 70's shape and give it a major modern makeover? You get Vince. This slick square aviator comes complete with a double bridge frame coupled with light-as-a-feather stainless steel arms. Choose from unique colors like midnight blue, rich caramel, and crystal brown, or stick with forever classic matte black.
